title: Proof for textile: "Pastoral Scene with Peacocks and Poultry"
medium: Gum paste (brown) on laid paper with deckle edges, pieced (4)
description: Print from Copper Plate.  The scene shows a male flutist seated on a section of masonry, before whom stands a shepherdess; nearby is a dog, some sheep and a reclining cow. At the left is a classical ruin and in the right foreground, a monument.
name: Print
